attributes.action: Introduce Education Programmes in Primary/Secondary Schools To Prevent Youngsters From Taking Up Smoking
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Primary and Secondary schools should do more to educate children on the health dangers of smoking, in the same way sex education is actively taught. More should be done to 'stigmatise' smoking and stop making kids think it is 'cool' to be seen smoking. Hopefully these measures will put kids off taking up smoking to begin with
